articles.title: Trump Sets New Tariff Rates, Shifts Timeline In Latest Trade Twist
articles.description: President Trump announced sweeping tariffs on dozens of countries, setting a new deadline of August 7 for steep tariffs on more than 60 countries, aiming to press ahead with new levies and shift timelines to clinch agreements.

articles.title: China Racing to Stop Population From Plunging to World War II Levels
articles.description: China's central government plans to offer parents a cash subsidy of up to $1,500 per child to reverse the country's declining birth rate, with analysts skeptical about its effectiveness in encouraging more births.

articles.title: Extreme Weather Causes Flooding and Travel Disruptions in Northeast US
articles.description: Heavy storms dumped torrential rain on the mid-Atlantic and Northeast regions, causing flooding along the Interstate 95 corridor, stranding vehicles, and disrupting air travel with ground stops at major airports.
